name: prohibitionist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who supports officially not allowing something, especially the sale of alcohol : Most people who are trying to tackle problem drinking are not prohibitionists. Carrie Nation, one of the most famous 19th century prohibitionists, used to smash up bars with a hatchet. In the early part of the 20th century, the US took a prohibitionist approach to the non-medical use of drugs.
More examplesFewer examplesDedicated prohibitionists see the use of medical marijuana as the first step down a slippery slope to full legalization.
